text:
@charliekirk11 Did you know:

Almost 90,000 Americans have lost their lives due to COVID-19 

The Republicans still don't have an adequate national testing strategy

And all Trump cares about is rage tweeting against Obama and those who speak out against his incompetent administration

Sick
